column2: What were your reasons for not getting help?¬†(Check all that apply.)
column9: ASK IF Q1 = Yes & Q2.4 = Yes
column17: 1 = Wanted to go, but health insurance didn't cover
column19: 3 = Didnít know any place to go for help
column20: 4 = Couldn't afford to pay the bill
column21: 5 = Didn't have any way to get there
column23: 7 = Thought the problem would get better by itself
column24: 8 = Was too embarrassed to discuss it with anyone
column25: 9 = Was afraid of what my boss, friends, family, or others would think
column26: 10 = Thought it was something I should be strong enough to handle alone
column27: 11 = Was afraid they would put me into the hospital
column28: 12 = Was afraid of the treatment they would give me
column31: 15 = A member of my family objected
column32: 16 = My family thought I should go but I didn't think it was necessary
column34: 18 = Was afraid I would lose my job
column36: 20 = Had to wait too long to get into a program
column37: 21 = Wanted to keep using medicines or drugs
column38: 22 = Didn't think medicine or drug problem was serious enough
column40: 24 = Stopped using medicines or drugs on my own
column41: 25 = Friends or family helped me stop using medicines or drugs
column42: 26 = Tried getting help before and it didn't work
column43: 27 = Was afraid my children would be taken away
column44: 28 = My religious beliefs don't allow me to go for treatment
